message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand your position, Bob, but $9,500 is cutting it a bit close for me.  How about we settle at $10,500? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and then some.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9,500 and $10,500. How about we try $10,000?
